thread.section_title: SEA Gamer Mall Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SEA Gamer Mall | seagm.com | 2 of 10
thread.title: Weng Kin
thread.title_full: SEA Gamer Mall reviewed by Weng Kin

author: Weng Kin
title: Weng Kin
text:
Have been serviced by this website multiple times over the years. Live chat is always quick to respond and helpful. The even do live calls for verification purposes. I would have given it a 5 star rating if one of their game products had better explanation and categorization, which lead me to make a redundant purchase.
But otherwise, great website for your game shopping needs.
